column4: Trying to run gedit (sudo gedit) and get an error: gedit: symbol lookup error: /usr/lib/i386-linux-gnu/libpangocairo-1.0.so.0: undefined symbol: cairo_ft_font_options_substitute What is the reason?
you will break your rights from the files you open with that
with gksudo terminal stays some seconds and command is returned with no run applicatiob...
